content: create your own adorable little monstera teething ring with this easy crochet pattern perfect for baby showers and last-minute gifts for all the plant-loving parents this pattern includes detailed instructions and photo tutorials right and left-handed video captioned video tutorials ensure success for every skill level the finished teething ring measures approximately 5 long x 6 wide excluding the hanging loop/ring in addition to being cute i designed the little monstera teething ring to be practical the leaf is 100% cotton so it s absorbent yet it s thin so it can be used as a little washcloth or get chewed on directly and still dry quickly and best of all you can remove it from the wooden ring to machine wash and dry it whenever needed **unique features-** easy one-piece crochet pattern includes a written pattern photo tutorial and video tutorial designed for easy care and cleanup fits a variety of nursery themes and styles **materials needed-** hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn lily sugar n cream solids https //amzn to/44ltwte worsted weight 15-20 yards
